summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique High Impact Easy Liquid Liner has all the drama of a liquid eyeliner without the drama of putting it on.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinique's mistake-proof liquid eyeliner pen creates a clean line in one steady sweep.Tapered, ultrafine precision brush paints on pure, deep color from thin to thick.24-hour smudge and budge-resistant wear.Ophthalmologist tested.Appropriate for people with sensitive eyes.Appropriate for contact lens wearers.No parabens. No phthalates. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Item 2590264How To UseFor a thin line use the liquid eyeliner pen's narrow tip. For a thicker line, lay the liquid eyeliner pen flat. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Alcohol, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Beheneth-30, Bentonite, Xanthan Gum, PEG-40 Stearate, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sorbitan Trioleate, Titanium/Titanium Dioxide, Aminomethyl Propanol, Citric Acid, Simethicone, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Black 2 (CI 77266), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For a thin line use the liquid eyeliner pen's narrow tip. For a thicker line, lay the liquid eyeliner pen flat. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.

reviews.headline: Love this product!!! My new go-to!!!!
reviews.comments: This liner goes on perfectly, stays fresh all day and doesn't smudge or come off. Applicator creates a very thin line and it always comes out great.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Don't waste your money.  Not much color

reviews.headline: I like it when it works
reviews.comments: It dries out and sometimes is dry when you take it right out of the box but when it does work it's great haha I am super allergic to most eyeliner or I would switch.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product.
reviews.comments: I love how easy it goes on. And stays on all day..

reviews.headline: Subtle, easy
reviews.comments: I dont normally like a felt tip liquid eyeliner, but this one checks all the boxes. It's easy to apply and is a very subtle coloring, versus a more hyperpigmented black/brown that i find in a liquid eyeliner. This is my current favorite liquid eyeliner.

reviews.headline: Maybe not for oily eyelids
reviews.comments: The brush is great, but this smudged VERY quickly on my oily, hooded eyes. So if you struggle with smudging, this might not be the one for you.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: It glides on smoothly and it's easy to use.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This is probably the best one I have used.  Very easy to make thin line and love the brown color.

reviews.headline: Dried out
reviews.comments: Normally, I'm very happy with this eyeliner however, this time when I purchased it, it seemed very dried out. I did return it..

reviews.headline: Clinique liquid eyeliner
reviews.comments: Great stuff. I've tried many different eyeliners and this is best of the best

reviews.headline: Best Eyeliner Ever!
reviews.comments: Love this liquid eyeliner!  Goes on very smooth and lasts the day and evening !

reviews.headline: eye liner
reviews.comments: love the liner but they need to update the the tap, because the product dries out. I think they do this so you buy more.

reviews.headline: I love it ðŸ˜€
reviews.comments: I buy it cause I love the product

reviews.headline: Favorite Liquid Eyeliner EVER
reviews.comments: I really can't believe some of the bad reviews about this eyeliner. I've tried brands like Estee Lauder, Lancome, Stila, Pat McGrath Labs, KVD, and more for liquid eyeliner. The Clinique is by far the best one I've ever used. It glides on smoothly and is hightly pigmented. This one lasts all day on me despite my oily eyelids (I do use a MAC primer for my eye makeup). I'll never get another eyeliner.

reviews.headline: EXPENSIVEEE but it's so good
reviews.comments:
I use it in black and do a dramatic cateye, and this is great! it is so durable, never rubs off, and very gentle.

i have very sensitive skin so this is the only eyeliner i use now. just wish it wasn't so pricy! it will last a few months though.

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: Got this as a free gift. I am an HUGE eyeliner wearer and this is the best one ive used. The tip is super fine and it stays all day. So good

reviews.headline: awful
reviews.comments: I'm so sorry to have to leave this review. I really wanted to like it but I just don't. it doesn't last 10 mins before it's smudging or wearing off. I have to apply it several times a day. if I hadn't paid so much for it I'd just throw it away.

reviews.headline: Great gift!
reviews.comments: I always buy these eyeliners for my mother in law, sister in law and niece. They like the look and feel of the eyeliner and always use it. Plus it stays on all day or unless they use makeup remover to take it off. It lasts longer than most other brands they have tried and is definitely worth the price!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Very easy to apply and lasts all day. Not pricey. I have tried many eyeliners, and this is the best

reviews.headline: Nice Liner Not Waterproof Though
reviews.comments: I like this eyeliner. It goes on easily and smoothly and the  color is good. Unfortunately, it is not waterproof and does wear off after a short time. I am still using it, but looking for something that lasts longer.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Stays put and easy to use!

display_values: Stays put and easy to use!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have a lot of wrinkles around the corners of my eyes due to strabismus and squinting as a teen before I got surgery, and this does not get lost in the creases or clump up. It goes on, stays, and I don't even feel it. Great for a natural look without any other makeup, or put it on with a full face for your special occasion. My everyday look is liner, mascara, and brow tint. I use the black liner and mascara, and my eyes just look a little brighter. When I am ready for a night out, I put this on a bit thicker over eyeshadow and add a little wing for the cat-eye.

This is my favorite eyeliner, and I've used a few liquid eyeliners. I first bought it a year ago when purchasing other Clinique items online to get the free shipping, and I haven't turned back. I use the black because my eyelashes are lighter toward the root, and this helps hide that (along with mascara).
faceoff_positive.headline: Dramatic or natural and lasts all day

faceoff_negative.comments: This has been my favorite eyeliner for years. I love how it glides, I have great control over how my lines look and they are extra sharp. It's a very beginner friendly eyeliner as well. Solid black, great payoff. HOWEVER, I'm not sure if I'm simply unlucky or something changed in their formula but I ordered 2 eyeliners since it was cheaper to buy directly from Clinique than a department store (at the time of writing this). The eyeliners I received are thin and watery. I called Clinique and was transferred multiple times. One of those times, the rep said formulas change from time to time but can only tell me if that's what happened if I still kept my box from the last eyeliner I bought over a year ago?? She wanted me to read the ingredients and that's how she would know if the formula changed. It seemed like this lady just couldn't be bothered. Anyway, if this is how the product is now, I don't recommend it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Watercolor eyeliner
